original_title: Tom Snyder's Electric Kool-Aid Talk Show
overview: While recorded in the late 70s and early 80s, the theme to this Tom Snyder release is icons of the 1960s. Features Ken Kesey,  the Grateful Dead, Dr. Timothy Leary, and Tom Wolfe as Guests  The Dead play a short set of 'On the Road Again,' 'Dire Wolf,' 'Deep Elm Blues' and an abbreviated 'Cassidy.
title: Tom Snyder's Electric Kool-Aid Talk Show
